featured.text: These folk healers also use observation and logic, but they are not so aware of it.
They use logic, definition, and repetition to learn.

definition.zh_def: 邏輯是研究推理和思維的原則和規則的學科。
definition.en_def: Logic is the study of the principles and criteria of valid inference and demonstration.
definition.example: She used logic to solve the complex problem.
